title: Netra Bhandari
text: I am a PhD student in the Environmental Informatics lab at Univeristy of Marburg. I am currently working in two projects, Kilimanjaro Socio-Ecological Systems and RIPA2TAN. I deal mainly with spatio-temporal data analysis.

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
2021-Ongoing PhD in Environmental Informatics
2018-2021 M.Sc. Global Change Ecology University of Bayreuth
2015-2017 M.Sc. Environmental Studies Univeristy of Delhi
2012-2015 B.Sc. Life Sciences University of Delhi
